"Our thoughts and prayers continue to be with the people of the Philippines." —President Obama. Here's how to help: http://t.co/BF7BofsUg1

— ABC News (@ABC) November 12, 2013

Here are 10 ways to help the victims of super typhoon #Haiyan. Let's send some love & assistance to the #Philippines http://t.co/dFTonIK4JW

This image says it all. Families in the Philippines need your help. Donate here: http://t.co/k0YKsyVhBs #Haiyan pic.twitter.com/2sR7fpmciH

My heart is weeping right now.To all of you in the Philippines,we're coming to help.The destruction you are enduring has the world with you!

— ian somerhalder (@iansomerhalder) November 14, 2013

Working on something for the Philippines. We can all #giveback and help those in need. Get involved.
